import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Versions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/config-svc/versions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the current configurations for a specified app.
Since any user can save configurations, it is strongly advised that you supply a list of
owners to filter on.
If no app is specified, the default "unnamed" app is used.
This is a public endpoint and does not require authentication.
Configuration data is non-sensitive. For sensitive data, refer to the Secret Service.

Configurations are used to control frontend behavior, A/B testing, feature flags, and other non-sensitive settings.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"afterJson":{"type":"string"},"appHost":{"example":"shoes.com","type":"string"},"ids":{"description":"Ids are camelCased slugs of the config owners.\nSpecifying only the ids will mean all of the config will be returned\nfor that key.\n\nIf the configs are large, consider using the `Selector` request field.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"limit":{"type":"integer"},"selector":{"additionalProperties":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"description":"Selector allows dotPath-based filtering per config owner.\nExample:\n{\n  \"user1\": [\"settings.theme\", \"featureFlags.enableNewUI\"],\n  \"user2\": [\"settings.language\"]\n}","type":"object"},"tags":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}},"required":["appHost"],"type":"object"}}},"description":"List Configs Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Current configuration","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"afterJson":{"description":"AfterJson is the cursor to fetch the next page, encoded as a JSON array string.\ne.g. '[\"2023-08-01T12:00:00Z\",\"versid-123\"]'","type":"string"},"versions":{"description":"Versions across all IDs, sorted by CreatedAt descending.","items":{"properties":{"appId":{"type":"string"},"createdAt":{"type":"string"},"data":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"},"dataJson":{"type":"string"},"id":{"description":"CamelCased slugs of the config owners","type":"string"},"internalId":{"type":"string"},"tags":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string"},"version":{"type":"string"}},"required":["appId","createdAt","data","dataJson","id","updatedAt"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"}},"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
